channel.title: 718 server development
channel.description:
So I just thought I would make thread ouf ot this since it would help keep up what to do and what is done :)
Source is citellum.
DONE for now (green): - selling at shop WORKS (before when you changed to sell tab you would still buy items from shops) - Added high & low alchemy - fixed squel of fortune (you don't lose or get spins or items as far as I know :) ) - burying bones gave xp before they disappeared - removed old owner priviledges - changed to interfaces & commands to new staff - enchanting (All basic items added, animations and gfx will be finished later on) - Player right click settings for only owners
STARTED (orange):
- playerlogger
Planned (red):
- sequel final fix - remove most items from shops - adjust drops - bugfixes :) [img]http://i.imgur.com/NnLesln.png[/img]
If you have good ideas you can throw them here too :)
BTW if you are interested to join add me on skype.

item.title: 718 server development
item.dc:creator: @zeropointx zeropointx
item.description:
@zeropointx wrote:

Frost (RSRevamped):

What the actual love bro stealing my ideas 1 day after I release wow you are very sad Btw your never gonna be able to do it as its ovbious you cant code lol leeching citellum hahahahahaah fail

I sense raging. Well let me just ansver to you: Yeah this server is leech of citellum atm, however its not gonna be that forever. All servers started as leech of somebody’s work one way or another. What comes to alching/enchanting I had no idea you had them and you can’t say I leech if it is already in runescape & I didn’t copy your code.
And to Flame_ thanks

Read full topic

item.title: 718 server development
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:

What the actual love bro stealing my ideas 1 day after I release wow you are very sad Btw your never gonna be able to do it as its ovbious you cant code lol leeching citellum hahahahahaah fail

You should use code tags to keep your development documented.
Good luck.

item.title: 718 server development
item.dc:creator: @zeropointx zeropointx
item.description:
@zeropointx wrote:

So I just thought I would make thread ouf ot this since it would help keep up what to do and what is done

Source is citellum.

DONE for now (green):

  • selling at shop WORKS (before when you changed to sell tab you would still buy items from shops)
  • Added high & low alchemy
  • fixed squel of fortune (you don’t lose or get spins or items as far as I know )
  • burying bones gave xp before they disappeared
  • removed old owner priviledges
  • changed to interfaces & commands to new staff
  • enchanting (All basic items added, animations and gfx will be finished later on)
  • Player right click settings for only owners

STARTED (orange):

  • playerlogger

Planned (red):

  • sequel final fix
  • remove most items from shops
  • adjust drops
  • bugfixes

If you have good ideas you can throw them here too

BTW if you are interested to join add me on skype.
